result.title: Weak test cases in problem 10D
result.content:
Problem 10D (http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/10/D) has very weak test cases.

My accepted solution (http://codeforces.com/contest/10/submission/27925504) which gives wrong answer 0 on input:

4
3 4 9 1
7
5 3 8 9 10 2 1

Correct answer: 2 Longest Common Increasing Subsequence is [3, 9].

Accepted solution on above input: http://ideone.com/ZvmHwS
